reference.shortdesc: The userinput element identifies text that a user types in response to an application or system prompt.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: This element is part of the software domain.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The userinput element is specialized from ph. It is defined in the software domain module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and keyref.

example.title: Example
example.p: In the following code sample, the userinput element identifies text that a user should type at the command prompt:
example.codeblock: From a DOS command prompt, type dir to view a list of files in the current directory.
